subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ben Crenshaw shot a four-under-par 66, taking a one-stroke lead over Fred Funk midway through the Senior Players Championship in Timonium, Md. ¶In-Kyung Kim shot a three-under 69 in cold, windy conditions to take a one-stroke lead over Mollie Fankhauser in the Longs Drugs Challenge in Danville, Calif. Top-ranked Lorena Ochoa was two shots behind. lpga (AP).
